text:
Can i tell the dispatch to use a specific implementation of a function instead of the _best_ match?
Suppose I have a generic implementation of a problem alongside a more specific implementation, i.e.
```function somefunction(a::Array{Float64, N}) where N # generic version
function somefunction(a::Array{Float64, 2}) # faster code for 2-dim case```
would it be possible to force the call of the first version with a 2 dim array in order to compare the results in tests?
